value.title: Releasing Healing Through Christ's Sacrifice
value.description: In the sermon 'Releasing Healing,' Pastor Tara Akinkuade delves into the profound truth that through Jesus Christ's death, burial, and resurrection, healing and victory over sicknesses have been secured for believers. Citing Isaiah 53:5, she emphasizes that Christ's suffering was for our transgressions and that by His stripes, we are healed. Pastor Tara outlines four practical ways to harness this healing, encouraging listeners to restore wholeness to their bodies and embrace a life of divine health. This message serves as a powerful reminder of the transformative power of faith in the healing that Christ offers.

value.title: Bearing Fruits of Healing
value.description: In this powerful sermon, Pastor Tara Akinkuade explores the profound connection between Jesus' sacrifice on the cross and the healing of our bodies. She emphasizes that just as Christ atoned for our sins, His sacrifice guarantees our healing. However, to experience this healing, we must take specific actions. Pastor Tara outlines essential steps such as rejecting feelings of condemnation, immersing ourselves in the truth of God's word, and awakening to our righteousness in Christ. This message encourages listeners to embrace their healing journey actively and highlights the transformative power of faith and action. Download, listen, and share this message to be transformed.

value.title: Faith Responses for Divine Health
value.description: In this sermon message, Pastor Tara explores the blessings that believers receive through the death, burial, and resurrection of Jesus Christ, particularly focusing on the gift of divine health. She emphasizes that to fully enjoy these blessings, believers must take proactive steps of faith that align with God's promises. Throughout the message, Pastor Tara outlines five specific actions of faith that can help individuals experience and maintain God's promises of divine health in their lives. This teaching encourages listeners to listen, share, and ultimately be transformed by the truth of God's Word.
